Package ohos.media.photokit.metadata

Class AVLoggerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.photokit.metadata.AVLoggerConnection

  • public class AVLoggerConnection
extends Object
    Provides your application with methods for transferring newly created or downloaded media files to the scanning service. The scanning service reads metadata from the media file and adds the file to the media database.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA_LIBRARY

        public AVLoggerConnection​(Context context,
                          AVLoggerConnectionClient client)

        context - Indicates the context required for establishing a connection to the scanning service.
        client - Indicates the callback for receiving notifications from the scanner.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Parameter invalid exception.

    • Method Detail

      • performLoggerFile

        public void performLoggerFile​(String path,
                              String mimeType)
        Requests to scan a media file based on the path and type of the file.
        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the path of the file to scan.
        mimeType - Indicates the MIME media type. If this parameter is null, the media type will be determined by the file name extension.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the file path is null.
        Since:
        3

      • performLoggerFile

        public static void performLoggerFile​(Context context,
                                     String[] paths,
                                     String[] mimeTypes,
                                     AVLogCompletedListener callback)
        Scans multiple media files at a time.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the caller context required for establishing a connection to the scanning service.
        paths - Indicates the array of paths to scan.
        mimeTypes - Indicates the array of the MIME media types matching the paths. If this parameter is null, the media types will be determined by the file name extensions.
        callback - Indicates the callback for receiving the scanned URIs.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if any parameter is invalid.
        Since:
        3

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected​()
        Checks whether the scanning service is connected.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the connection is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • onServiceConnect

        public void onServiceConnect​()
        Called when the application connects to the scanning service.

        This callback will not be triggered if the application has already connected to the scanning service or the scanning service crashes during the connection. Do not directly invoke this callback. Instead, override this callback via a subclass to define an operation after the connection.

        Since:
        4

      • onServiceDisconnect

        public void onServiceDisconnect​()
        Called when the application disconnects from the scanning service.

        The disconnect() method does not trigger this callback. This callback is usually invoked when the process of the scanning service crashes or is terminated. In this case, the application is still connected to the scanning service, and onServiceConnect() will be invoked after the scanning service starts next time. Do not directly invoke this callback. Instead, override this callback via a subclass to define an operation after the disconnection.

        Since:
        4
